subject: Football
lead_paragraph: LaDainian Tomlinson scored four touchdowns and became  the fastest player in N.F.L. history to reach 100 career touchdowns in Sunday night’s victory over the Broncos.
snippet: LaDainian Tomlinson scored four touchdowns and became  the fastest player in N.F.L. history to reach 100 career touchdowns in Sunday night’s victory over the Broncos.
